FINANCE CONTROLLER

SUMMARY

Hands on Controller with over 12 years of experience in financial accounting and management, acknowledged for sound decision-making abilities, analytical skills, business acuity and problem solving skills.
Strategic, methodical and reliable, enjoy the challenge of resolving long term issues, and influencing positive bottom line outcomes.
Enjoy opportunities to think outside the box deriving new solutions to old problems through strategic information gathering, data collection and comprehensive scrutiny.
Persuasive and concise communicator; experienced in dealing with all levels of management and coaching subordinates for greater productivity and success.
Highlights
Financial statement analysis Account reconciliation expert Budget forecasting expertise Complex problem solving
Effective time management Excellent managerial techniques Strong organizational skills Flexible team player

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Successfully led globalization of accounting operations resulting in streamlined processes and reduction in month end close cycle.
Designed process and led implementation team of automated invoice and credit memo approval workflow tool.
Implemented monthly operational financial review process resulting in more effective P&L management.
Responsible for preparing division balance sheet and delivered monthly Executive Balance Sheet review to Division CFO and business stakeholders.

EXPERIENCE

Provide financial decision support to region and account leaders; produce monthly report decks, review and analyze financial variances and provide accounting guidance
Streamlined monthly close process to automate revenue recognition and reduce manual entries
Developed a new process for mapping pricing models on newly signed contracts to provide project level financial proformas

Developed the accounting and financial infrastructure post-acquisition including the selection/implementation of an ERP system, recruiting staff and establishing accounting policies and procedures.
Automated the foreign consolidation process reducing the monthly close from 15 days to 9.
Improved cash flow decreasing DSO from 96 days to 42 days by securing Letters of Credit for all import customer sales and implementing an EDI billing system with "Big Box" accounts.
Developed key metric reporting and profitability analysis and presented findings to the executive committee to provide guidance on strategic business decisions.
Studied and collected information to determine standard and actual costs of engineered flooring manufacturing including raw material purchases, inventory, and labor.
Evaluated actual manufacturing costs and prepared periodic reports comparing standard costs to actual production costs.
Proven experience delivering clean audits by implementing strong processes and policies leading to the completion of five clean annual financial audits.

Reviewed accounting policies and ensured compliance and integration with established GAAP.
Streamlined procurement process through the re-distribution of workflow processes, automating purchase orders and reducing headcount.

Sales tax compliance analysis - software selection and implementation.

Oversaw the automated subledger reconciliation and accrual entries for over 5000 journal entry lines.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Marketing Role

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About The Company

Wheel is a Series C funded digital health market and SAAS company that delivers holistic virtual care experiences, configured to your business needs. Best in class care delivery technology powered by a stellar clinician network that drives engagement and loyalty through seamless, personalized care that consumers comes back to again and again.

About The Position

Wheel Health is searching for an innovative and experienced individual for the remote role of Director, Digital Marketing and Engagement. This role will have responsibility for leading web strategy and development, digital marketing, marketing technology and analytics. The ideal candidate will be creative, innovative, and scrappy - able to create and deliver best-in-class digital marketing and engagement solutions. This role is essential to Wheel’s current objectives and future strategic plan/growth strategy.

What You’ll Do (4 Core Parts)

Digital Strategy/Web, Acquisition Marketing, Engagement

Develop and communicate clear digital strategic roadmap as well as tangible priorities for digital web/mobile development.Build, test and optimize cross channel marketing campaigns including content, SEO/SEM, and paid advertisements to drive lead acquisition and elevate brand awarenessDefine best practice strategies for campaign landing page environments; consistently optimized to yield increased ROI.Partner with VP Marketing, Director of Integrated Campaigns to create and deliver high-impact, measurable results for digital marketing programs.

Marketing Technology & Operations

Lead development and optimization of Wheel website and digital experience.Establish digital engagement/marketing technology roadmap and plan for successful talent and budget resourcing.Work closely with the sales team to increase the quality and quantity of inbound leads, own the lead scoring / nurture SOPs, definitions, and programsManage digital platforms and digital production capabilities, for example: CRM technology (Salesforce), Marketing automation (Pardot), Website (Wordpress, Craft, etc), as well as social media and analytics.

Analytics/Data

Lead Marketing analytics and reporting capabilities / function in partnership with VP MarketingProvide regular analytics and insights for executive leadership reporting. Ensure the department has an analytics technology stack and skills needed for function.

Team & Functional Leadership

Advance new strategies while ensuring ongoing digital operations continue effectively, even in the face of resourcing and budget constraints.Forecast and recommend budgets and resources needed for digital strategic initiativesPartnering with the VP Marketing, establish project intake governance and prioritization to ensure effective resource allocation of talent and product capabilities.Foster a highly collaborative working relationship with peers to create cross-functional teams in support of marketing plan implementation and business objectives.Establish strong vendor, agency and business partnerships to ensure successful, compliant project execution.Lead and partner on complex, enterprise, cross-functional projects that align critical stakeholders and secure effective design and execution of project plans.Bring passion and inspiration to team management, mentorship and growth.

Who You Are

7+ years in B2B digital marketing experience (SaaS)Data-driven planner and strategist; thorough understanding of current marketing technology stack and demonstrated ability to create strong end-to-end digital engagement.Experience leading and managing Marketing operations and processes, including lead management (scoring), database management, segmentation, email marketing, and analytics.Proven track record in managing, optimizing and evolving marketing technology and analytics platformsExperience and familiarity with research and analysis of data - and the ability to design, produce and interpret dataCustomer-centric, always seeks to optimize customer ease of access/experience.Highly collaborative; working effectively as part of an experienced, diverse team and successfully advocating for strong ideas.Digital marketing experience - marketing automation, landing pages, A/B testing, CRM-journeys for lead capture, nurturing and conversion.Track record of managing multiple projects at the same time in a fast-paced environment.Experience using Salesforce, Marketing Automation, and MarTech Tools to drive ABMAdvanced Level at Salesforce - including Campaigns, integrations with marketing platforms, APIs, etc.Advanced Level at SEO, Google Adwords, Google Analytics, LinkedIn AdsAdvanced Level at Wordpress, including integrations with forms and other pluginsProcess-focused approach with desire to roll-up your sleeves and solve problemsStrong communication and performance measurement skills

Wheel is proud to be an EEOC.

Compensation Range: $175K - $195K

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
